_comments.source_folders: List of root folders to scan. Can be multiple folders.
_comments.output_folder: Where to save the generated map file.
_comments.include_folders_only: WHITELIST MODE: If set, ONLY these folders are processed. Leave empty [] to disable.
_comments.add_include_folders: ADDITIVE MODE: Always include these folders even if they match exclude patterns. Great for handpicking specific vendor packages.
_comments.exclude_folders: Folders to skip. These are the default patterns plus any you add.
_comments.include_files_only: WHITELIST MODE: If set, ONLY these files are processed. Leave empty [] to disable.
_comments.add_include_files: ADDITIVE MODE: Always include these specific files (highest priority). Overrides all exclusion rules.
_comments.exclude_files: Files to skip. Can use filenames or relative paths.
_comments.text_extensions: File extensions to include full content. Others will only be registered by name.
_comments.max_file_size_mb: Skip files larger than this size (in megabytes).

example_1_scan_everything.description: Scan all folders normally, respecting exclude patterns

example_5_add_config_files.description: Normal scan + always include these config files

example_6_combined.description: Scan only app folder but add specific vendor files
